name: inter-view
description:
inter-view is a game where your choices create a unique piece of music.

Created, programmed, and music by Megan Carnes. I want to make music for your game! www.megancarnesmusic.com

Soundtrack album coming soon!

Written by: David Sugarman, Megan Carnes
Artwork by: Soju Shots
Flute: Marybeth Kern
Guitar: Matthew Lister
Tuned wine glasses: Jonny Rodgers
